abstract: BlackRock reports first-quarter profit of $711 million, down 14 percent from $830 million in year-ago quarter.

headline.print_headline: BlackRock, Hurt by Markets, Reports Slide in Profit
headline.main: BlackRock, Hurt by Volatile Markets, Reports Slide in Profit

snippet: For the first quarter, BlackRock said that its net earnings declined to $711 million, compared with $830 million in the quarter a year ago.
lead_paragraph: For the first quarter, BlackRock said that its net earnings declined to $711 million, compared with $830 million in the quarter a year ago.
